#!/bin/bash
mkdir -p /home/centos/.ssh
cat <<FILE > /home/ec2-user/.ssh/authorized_keys
ssh-rsa  jombay@jombay-Latitude-3490
FILE
chown centos.centos /home/centos/.ssh/authorized_keys
chmod 400 /home/centos/.ssh/authorized_keys
sudo yum -y install wget unzip
cd /home/centos
wget https://github.com/harshalk91/wikimedia-deploy/archive/master.zip
unzip wikimedia-deploy-master.zip
cd wikimedia-deploy-master
sh minikube-install.sh
sleep 5
sh deploy.sh
